channel.title: terminal freezes after SSH login to VPS
channel.description: I have a problem connecting to VPS too, it asks me to enter my login and after it, when it asks me to enter my password for VPS it just freezes, the workstation itself is working, but terminal just freezes. Can you please tell me how i can fix it

I have a problem connecting to VPS too, it asks me to enter my login and after it, when it asks me to enter my password for VPS it just freezes, the workstation itself is working, but terminal just freezes.
Can you please tell me how i can fix it
